sub_title: Director CHILL, we connect education and business within the area of Chemistry and Materials
summary:
CHILL is an environment in which you can do or let do your investigations in a fast, flexible, safe and reliable way. We cover the whole area from material synthesis, converting, characterisation and analysis of (bio)materials. We always work in communities with client, experienced professional, coach en students. With this team we create your solution.
As a director with more than 30 years of broad experience in the field I manage this process for you. It is for me a real challenge to bring this public private coorporation to the next level.

Feel free to contact me so we can search together for a solution. 
 You can reach me by mail ✉ peter.engelen@chillabs.nl or phone ✆ 06-20497089
